abstrac: Bring the vision to life with hard work and knowledge.
bio:
My name is Jaime. I joined the military 5 years ago to be able to pay for school at Full-Sail University where I got my B.A.S and studied cinematography. The day I got out of the service I moved up here to New York to purse my career in film. My first internship/freelance work was for Karma loop TV and recently a few months ago I was working as a photographers assistant for Pharallel Williams digital cover shoot for Complex Magazine. 

In addition to my education, I have self-taught and have acquired various skills besides videography in software’s such as Photoshop, Illustrator, Adobe Creative CC with after effects and premier, as well as various third party plugins. Above I have attached a copy of my resume and below are some example of things I have done on my own and things I have helped on. I hope to hear back from you and it would be great to work together.


Examples

(shot, edited, color correction, graphics and audio)

abstrac: Refuse to conform to the norm! Renegade Muse Interiors is your top choice for residential, commercial and contemporary design in Southern California.
bio:
Renegade Muse Interiors is a residential and commercial interior design firm based in Los Angeles, California.  Our passion for creating functional, stylish, and contemporary spaces is matched only by the competency and creativity that we bring to all of our projects.  Utilizing a mixture of modern and contemporary components with simple, clean lines and warm colors and textures, we deliver twenty-first century living in a way that rejuvenates and inspires homeowners and renters to relax and truly enjoy their home. We specialize in helping our clients achieve the ultimate level of functionality from their space while capturing the individual style and personality of every customer through our unique designs. 

Brian K. Jackson (Designer)

From an early age, Brian Jackson discovered a natural love and gift for two things: music and interior design.  As a successful music industry executive, he has used his uncanny instinct for recognizing talent to identify and help unlock the true potential of undiscovered artists so that a world of music lovers can ultimately experience what he realized was a "diamond in the rough".  It is this same instinct and creative approach that Jackson brings to the world of interior design.  Whether a project is a large or small, new and unfinished, or fully-furnished in need of a makeover, Jackson is able to identify the potential of any space and to apply his creativity and insight to transform it to a show-stopping interior that is guaranteed to impress.
Fee TBD based on a project-by-project basis.  Projects are to be paid 50% upon commencement; 50% upon completion.  3D renderings are also available for a separate fee if not hired for the job.

description.title: Bookkeeping/Accounting/Administrative
description: Full Charge Bookkeeper with Quick Books experience. Specialize in accounts receivable, accounts payable and bank reconciliation. Provide administrative assistant support to corporate heads.

abstrac: Virtue Services is here to provide you with your Administrative, Bookkeeping and Accounting needs
bio:
Virtue Services 

Virtue Services was founded by its owner Patricia, in June 2009 to provide all of your bookkeeping, administrative and accounting needs.  Patricia dedicated 28 years to the County of San Diego in various departments as well as various positions prior to her retirement.  

Patricia acquired her knowledge as well as passion for accounting in the Auditor and Controller's office. There she became a Subject Matter Expert in the operations of Revenue Rents and Lease (Account Receivables) and the Developers Trust Fund (Account Payables).  Monthly General Ledger reconciliation of funds over a million dollars was a small part of her tasks.   

Patricia having the desire to have her education match her skill set, decided to return to college. She choose to attend San Diego Christian College and majored in Business Management. In July 2012, she graduated with a Bachelor of Science degree in Business Management. 

Patricia is driven for success. and in the spirit of excellence, is the way she plans to achieve it.  Throughout her life as a mother, mentor, youth leader and manager, she have always encouraged individuals to strive for excellence, and in the spirit of the strive, we will perform at our best.   

She provides companies with accounts payables, accounts receivables and bank reconciliation assistance.  She will also assist your company with entering daily receipts, credit card reconciliation and more for a fraction of the cost of a full charge accountant. Patricia is also experienced in providing Administrative Assistance Support to company and department heads. 

She has the ability to get the job done as well as providing an added financial contribution to your business.  She will review your receivables for accuracy and collect outstanding accounts.  She will strive to increase your monthly receivable based on professional collection efforts.
Hours of operations is 8:00 am to 8pm Monday through Friday.  Payments is due upon receipt of invoice and a late penalty of $35.00 will be assess after 10 days from date of invoice.
